feed.title: Python and Data Science Blog - misc

entry.title: About
entry.content: Hi, I am Abhishek and I wrote this blog using Pelican, a static site generator powered by Python. I shall blog about Python and Data science concepts here. Hope you find the content useful! :-)

entry.title: First Post on My Sweet New Blog
entry.content:
My first post hosted using Github pages!

This is my first post on my new blog. You can refer to this tutorial to host your own blog on Github. Hope this is the first of many to come!
